comment: Lemma for ~ issiga and ~ isrnsiga . The class of sigma-algebras with base set ` o ` is a set. Note: a more generic version with ` ( O e. _V -> ... ) ` could be useful for ~ sigaval . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 24-Oct-2016.)
